title: Danni Girl Mysteries The Complete Series
description: Danni is just an average girl, trying to make her way through college, not completely sure what she really wants to do in life once she graduates. Enjoying workouts with hot men and hanging out with her handsome neighbor, her calm and peaceful lifestyle is quickly turned upside down when unexpected murders fall in her path. With two handsome men at her side, Danni finds her own ways of solving these crimes.
author: Debra Sue Brice
